traits.name: (Striker) Bloodfury
traits.detail: When you are bloodied, you become enraged; -2 AC and +2 attack.

traits.name: Aura: Damaging
traits.detail: The space around you is dangerous. Creatures take 15 necrotic damage when they enter your aura or start their turn within it.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.detail: Hezzebal makes two attacks with his Claws, and one with his Bite.

actions.name: Claw
actions.detail: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_ [damage/4-0.25, d6] slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.detail: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs. AC. _Hit:_ [damage/4-0.25, d8] piercing damage, plus 3d8 necrotic damage.

actions.name: Black Lightning
actions.detail: Each creature in a 90' line must make a [dc-primary] DEX save or take [damage/2-0.5, d12] lightning damage.

actions.name: Necrotic Surge (recharge 6)
actions.detail: Each creature within 30' of Hezzebal must make a [dc-primary] save or take [damage+2, d10] necrotic damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.detail: Each creature within 300' of Hezzebal must make a [dc-secondary] WIS save or be frightened (save ends).
